titles.title: K-1 Visa Program Suspension Act of 2015
To prohibit the admission of K-1 nonimmigrants and to prohibit the issuance of K-1 visas, and for other purposes.
K-1 Visa Program Suspension Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

bill.summary:
K-1 Visa Program Suspension Act of 2015
This bill prohibits the admission of K-1 nonimmigrants (fiancee or fiance) and the issuance of K-1 visas.
The Government Accountability Office shall review the national security risks associated with the K-1 visa program.
